issue.title: [CF 1013] PowerBar LUA Error
issue.body:
Is there a way to tell which icon this is happening on ? I get it on my monk and druid as well. I have a whole bunch of buttons with the power bar displayed on them using an offset setting (energy).

Even when i disable AchieveIt then it's just another error thrown be AceEvent in some other addon.
